title: Simulation-Based Vehicle Control System Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control theory, linear system modeling, introductory programming (Python/C++), and understanding of communication protocols
context.additional_context: Cultivating problem-solving skills in system control within wireless communication environments using smartphone-based simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can design state estimators for unmanned surface vehicles (USVs) in DoS attack scenarios to model unmeasured variables
Learners can implement control algorithms that generate speed reference values for helicopters by applying virtual vehicle concepts
Learners can apply backward control strategies using barrier Lyapunov functions in constrained input environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
